    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Pogum (delo s slovarjem)</string>
            <string language="en">Courage (working with dictionary)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mut (arbeitend mit Verzeichnis)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courage (fonctionnant avec le dictionnaire)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coragem (que trabalha com dicionário)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Coraggio (che funziona con il dizionario)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θάρρος (που λειτουργεί με το λεξικό)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Valor (que trabaja con el diccionario)</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">S pomočjo nalog se učijo uporabljati SSKJ, v knjižni ali elektronski obliki.</string>
            <string language="en">Drilling the usage of dictionary in order to answer the questions regarding the word courage.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">branje</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">uporaba</string>
            <string language="en">usage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slovar</string>
            <string language="en">dictionary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bohrung des Verbrauches des Verzeichnisses, um 
die Fragen betreffend sind den Wortmut zu beantworten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forage de l'utilisation du dictionnaire afin de 
répondre aux questions concernant le courage de mot.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perfurando o uso do dicionário a fim responder 
às perguntas a respeito da coragem da palavra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perforare l'uso del dizionario per rispondere 
alle domande per quanto riguarda il coraggio di parola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάτρυση της χρήσης του λεξικού προκειμένου να 
απαντηθούν οι ερωτήσεις σχετικά με το θάρρος λέξης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Perforar el uso del diccionario para contestar a 
las preguntas con respecto al valor de la palabra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbrauch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verzeichnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture</string>
